name: Treasure Checklist
description: Do you have the icon that you wanted?

group-chests.name: Group Tier II Rewards
group-chests.description: Rewards from <cg>Tier II Chests</c> (25, 50 and 100 Keys) are grouped together.

sorted-rewards.name: Sort Golden Key rewards
sorted-rewards.description: Displays the rewards from <cy>Golden Key Chests</c> in their settled order.

disable-checkmark.name: Checkmark Items
disable-checkmark.description: Disabling this allows the Icons to be displayed without the checkmark. If you want to see the designs.

wraith-page.name: Wraith's Rewards
wraith-page.description: Adds a page with the Special Chest rewards from the 4th Vault (<cp>The Wraith</c>).
